attributes.action: Cap rent that landlords can charge
attributes.additional_details: They should cap the rent landlords can charge so people can afford it
attributes.background: The government should cap what rent landlords can charge. There are so many homeless people because they can’t afford their rent. People are working more just to keep a roof over there families heads and still have no money to put food on the table

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

Establish a national regulator for private landlords to ensure fair rent: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640882

Put a cap on profits made by private landlords: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648065
